The Quranic researcher is that the righteous of the righteous, that is, from the infidels, as in the sea or from it, and from the taboos, as in the guidance with their Lord, that is, in the last, then it is a special one in it, and it is not for it.Its majesty or in the neighborhood was sanctified by the gardens of the gardens in which only the righteousness of the difficulty of what is disturbed by the treasures and the fear of the disappearance and the fear of the day is from the sake Because it is distinguished by the distinction of the paradise of the world and the exposure that the paradise of the world is for a majority of it.
